xdi2.messaging.container.impl.file

Class FileMessagingContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.impl.AbstractMessagingContainer
      • xdi2.messaging.container.impl.graph.GraphMessagingContainer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, MessagingContainer, Prototype<GraphMessagingContainer>

    public class FileMessagingContainer
extends GraphMessagingContainer
    An XDI messaging container backed by a file in one of the serialization formats.
    Author:
    markus
